title: King of the Hammers - Element of Survival (2014)
description:
Hammerking Productions in conjunction with HeavyMetalConcepts released the trailer for the 2014 Griffin King of the Hammers Presented by Nitto Tire movie titled, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Element of SurvivalÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ today. The race, which is already known as the Ã¢â‚¬Å“toughest one-day off-road race on the planetÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ proved exceptionally brutal in 2014 with only 32 of the 158 teams that started finishing in time. The title is a reference to the tenacity of those drivers that were able to finish, including this yearÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s winner, Loren Healy, who overcame multiple obstacles throughout the day to claim his 2nd KOH victory.

The movie will document the week-long off-road racing event held every February in Johnson Valley, CA. 2014 marked the 7th year for the race which featured more than 400 teams and 40,000 spectators competing in over 5 days of racing. The movie will also include highlights from the King of the Motos presented by Trail Tech, 4 Wheel Parts Qualifying Days, KOH UTV race, and the Smittybilt Every Man Challenge.




If you enjoy what you watched, support the sport and BUY IT: kohthemovie.com
